aka: The King Who Contemplated the Sea

writer.name: 让-塞巴斯蒂安·肖万 Jean-Sébastien Chauvin

director.name: 让-塞巴斯蒂安·肖万 Jean-Sébastien Chauvin

this_title: Le roi qui contemplait la mer
trans_title: The King Who Contemplated the Sea
introduction: Paul lands in a Mediterranean seaside resort. He is enjoying a few moments by the sea, when his gaze is captured by the arrival of a muscular man with a tanned complexion. This stranger becomes his obsession, fueling a destabilizing desire.
chinese_title: Le roi qui contemplait la mer
